> â›” **Internal**: This @std package is for internal use and not intended for public consumption. APIs may change or be removed.

## Overview

<p>Internal utilities for the public API of the Deno Standard Library.</p>
<p>Note: this module is for internal use only and should not be used directly.</p>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class="pl-k">import</span> { diff, diffStr, buildMessage } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/internal"</span>;
<span class="pl-k">import</span> { assertEquals } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/assert"</span>;

<span class="pl-k">const</span> a <span class="pl-c1">=</span> [<span class="pl-c1">1</span>, <span class="pl-c1">2</span>, <span class="pl-c1">3</span>];
<span class="pl-k">const</span> b <span class="pl-c1">=</span> [<span class="pl-c1">1</span>, <span class="pl-c1">2</span>, <span class="pl-c1">4</span>];

<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">diff</span>(a, b), [
  { <span class="pl-c1">type</span>: <span class="pl-s">"common"</span>, <span class="pl-c1">value</span>: <span class="pl-c1">1</span> },
  { <span class="pl-c1">type</span>: <span class="pl-s">"common"</span>, <span class="pl-c1">value</span>: <span class="pl-c1">2</span> },
  { <span class="pl-c1">type</span>: <span class="pl-s">"removed"</span>, <span class="pl-c1">value</span>: <span class="pl-c1">3</span> },
  { <span class="pl-c1">type</span>: <span class="pl-s">"added"</span>, <span class="pl-c1">value</span>: <span class="pl-c1">4</span> },
]);

<span class="pl-k">const</span> diffResult <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-en">diffStr</span>(<span class="pl-s">"Hello, world!"</span>, <span class="pl-s">"Hello, world"</span>);

<span class="pl-smi">console</span>.<span class="pl-en">log</span>(<span class="pl-en">buildMessage</span>(diffResult));
<span class="pl-c">// [</span>
<span class="pl-c">//   "",</span>
<span class="pl-c">//   "",</span>
<span class="pl-c">//   "    [Diff] Actual / Expected",</span>
<span class="pl-c">//   "",</span>
<span class="pl-c">//   "",</span>
<span class="pl-c">//   "-   Hello, world!",</span>
<span class="pl-c">//   "+   Hello, world",</span>
<span class="pl-c">//   "",</span>

import { assertEquals } from &quot;@std/assert&quot;;

const a = [1, 2, 3];
const b = [1, 2, 4];

assertEquals(diff(a, b), [
  { type: &quot;common&quot;, value: 1 },
  { type: &quot;common&quot;, value: 2 },
  { type: &quot;removed&quot;, value: 3 },
  { type: &quot;added&quot;, value: 4 },
]);

const diffResult = diffStr(&quot;Hello, world!&quot;, &quot;Hello, world&quot;);

console.log(buildMessage(diffResult));
